3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Single Family Alternative w/ Ultimate Easy Living at the Beach! Fabulous + spacious beach retreat atop tree lined st,positioned b/w Established Outer Richmond, Sutro Heights + Seacliff, but w/maximum convenience- JUST 2 blocks to Popular Balboa Village! Start your morning w/ a surf/bike/run/walk to the beach, GG Park, Lands End Trails, museums, golf courses. At night,walk stepsto popular Balboa Village for dinner + a flick at the iconic Balboa Theater- playing cult classics w/beverages (also various resto/parklets/wellness/cafes). Some of the best simple pleasures outside your doorstep, incl Outer Sunset + Clement mins away. Expansive home has newer systems & functionality; simply move right in, w/out all the additional costs to do these upgrades yourself $$.Open floor plan w/ fireplace + sun patio off living spaces. Sun drenched windows in every room.Quiet back bedrooms, both en-suite.Primary Bd has massive closets, spa-like bath featuring dual vanity, jacuzzi + shower. Downstairs enjoy the grand scale family/media room, plus 3rd bedroom.Exclusive backyard!!!! Soak the sun, or take in the fresh coastal air. Secured storage, easygarage parking, in unit w/d. This is for a single family home buyer who wants something newer that they can just move right into. Must see!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Classic Barrel Front Outer Richmond Home. This spacious home features a large living room with fireplace, formal dining room with built-in cabinet, kitchen with gas stove and side door to light well and stairs to lower level. There are two bedrooms off the hallway, and a full bath with shower over tub. At the rear of the property, a rear bedroom has been split to create two additional rooms. The lower level includes a social room, half bath and two storage rooms. A large rear yard and one car garage with laundry appliances complete this home. Upgraded double pane windows throughout most of the home. Close to GG Park, Ocean Beach and Balboa Street restaurants and shops. Property is tenant occupied, and sold subject to tenants rights.
Confidential Remarks: May be shown during Coming Soon period. Showing by appointment only. Only one tenant of record, using the downstairs rooms primarily (there is no full bath downstairs, only a half-bath). Tenant has subleased upstairs rooms to 3-4 occupants without owner consent. Owner attempted to engage tenant in buyout negotiations, but tenant did not respond. Lease increases from $4,000/mo to $4,800/mo effective January 1, 2024. Owner is replacing roof in January 2024.

Public Remarks: A one-of-a-kind home in Outer Richmond, meticulously designed, exquisite down to the studs renovation of a classic Edwardian home, no expenses were spared when renovating this 5BR/6.5BA masterpiece! The stairwell leading to the top floor is striking, with soaring ceiling, show-stopping chandelier, and two large skylights, featuring 3 BR on the top level, all En-suite rooms with bath! 4th En-suite on the lower level near the spacious entertainment room, an office, exercise room. Throughout the home, features large windows, showcasing sweeping Golden Gate Park views. Top of the line appliances and fixtures, hardwood floors throughout and custom blinds and drapes. Oversized 2 car detached garage, large room with En-suite bathroom behind the garage, perfect guest space or Au-Pair room. Prime location one block from Golden Gate Park, a quick walk to Balboa Street movies, shops and restaurants, close to Ocean Beach, Lincoln Park Golf Course and easily accesses the Muni, Frwy 101 & 280.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Sana Wen - 650-759-6109 - Unique Spanish style home right next to Golden Gate Park and Spreckels Lake. Nice living room faces to the park and receives morning sun. Beautiful formal dinning room has natual lights from both front and side windows. Cute breafast room next to Kitchen. Two good size bedrooms in the back with view of backyard. A large and bright 1bd/1ba penthouse on the top. Two car garage with extra space and high ceiling. Great in-law potential! Walking distance to Ocean Beach. Five-minute drive to Region of Honor. With some work, you will turn this unique house into your dream home! RH-2 zoning district.

Public Remarks: Newly remodeled Richmond abode situated between Balboa St. and Lincoln Park. This spectacular home features a newly constructed open dining room and living room as well as a kitchen fitted with Viking appliances, spacious counters, a pantry, and an oversized island. The top floor has numerous skylights and windows to allow an abundance of natural light in every room. It also features a primary ensuite with floor to ceiling closets and a generous bathroom with a soaking tub, large shower, and dual vanities as well as another bedroom and 2nd full bath. The lower level has a comfortable family room, wet bar, guest ensuite, a full bath perfect for in-laws, and a single-car garage. The exterior features a stunning designer landscaped yard with a newly heightened fence for privacy as well as a newly constructed wood deck with a faux lawn. This gorgeous dwelling is centrally located in the Outer Richmond District making it just a short walk to Cabrillo Park, and a plethora of restaurants.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Exquisite down to the studs renovation of a classic home located in the Shoreview neighborhood! No expenses were spared in this 4BR/5.5BA masterpiece! The main level features an open floor plan, large living room with fireplace, gourmet kitchen with custom cabinets, large center island, and top of the line appliances, dining room, powder room, a picturesque window overlooking the enchanting backyard, and an exit to a deck. Upstairs consists of three bedrooms including a primary bedroom suite with walk-in closet and lavish bath. The other bedrooms all have their own unique baths and custom closets. The lower level has an entertainment / game room, and the fourth bedroom with its own bath, den/office that can be used as the 5th BR, and another full bathroom. Other amenities include a one-car garage with EV charger, beautiful landscaping, radiant floors, CAT6 cables, built in ceiling speakers, and much much more! Details throughout, must see to appreciate!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This delightful 3-Bedroom 2-Bath Condominium offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. One of only 2 units in a lovely boutique (circa 1903) building, this home is gracious in size, move-in ready and checks all of the boxes! Floor plan with great flow and wide plank engineered Oak floors throughout. Open and airy living room, adjoining formal dining room and remodeled kitchen with beautiful finishes and stainless steel appliances. All 3 Bedrooms are ample in size and include great closet space. En-suite Master bedroom and second bedroom/den have direct access to a nicely landscaped shared back garden. Private additional outdoor space is adjacent to living room. Full size front loading washer/dryer within the home and 1 car side-by-side garage parking + storage space is included. Low HOA dues @ $150/month. Outdoor enthusiasts will love the close proximity to Ocean Beach, Golden Gate Park and Lands End trails. Convenient shopping nearby including markets, cafes, and trendy restaurants. Welcome Home!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: New Price! This spectacular Edwardian home has been in the same family for 48 years and is perched above most of the neighborhood to offer wonderful views of Golden Gate Park and the Pacific Ocean. The main level consists of a lovely entry foyer; a bright living room with fireplace and tall ceilings; a spacious formal dining room; an adjacent breakfast room overlooking the garden; an updated powder room; and a large kitchen with new appliances, ample cabinets and counters, and new flooring. On the upper level, the large, sunny master bedroom includes a dressing room with closets and wonderful views to the southwest overlooking the park and ocean. There are two additional large bedrooms on this level, one facing the rear garden with views to USF, and the other with south-facing windows looking over the park and ocean. A bright sunroom off of the bedrooms with exceptional views would make a great office. An updated full bath with tub and stall shower completes this level. The garage level has a storage or hobby room, laundry, a full bath, and one car parking. The sunny and large rear yard offers mature trees and a large concrete patio. Balboa Street shops and restaurants, & Golden Gate Park both within walking distance.
Confidential Remarks: Email Anthony to request disclosures. Lockbox located on gas meter, show anytime. Anthony's Mobile: 415-939-7854. Half-bath, full bath at garage level, and garage bonus room may have been added without permits. Trust sale, no court confirmation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Experience the allure of this beautifully renovated single-family home in San Francisco's vibrant Richmond neighborhood. The inviting interior features a spacious living room w/wood-burning fireplace, recessed lighting & hardwood floors, creating a cozy & modern ambiance. The dining room boasts built-ins, designer chandelier, hardwood floors, perfect for hosting holiday gatherings & family meals. The remodeled sun-filled kitchen w/designer finishes, is a chef's dream! Stainless appliances, quartz counters, microwave, disposal, dishwasher, & a large 3-door refrigerator, an exquisite setting for masterful culinary delights! Adjacent to the kitchen is a convenient home office; providing a sunny space to work-from-home, or home-work. The full bath on the main level is beautifully remodeled adding a touch of luxury to everyday living. This home offers 4 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, & ample garage parking, including a 220V outlet for Fast EV Charging! The spacious private fenced yard, w/patio, grass, mature trees & flowers, ideal for outdoor entertaining, kids playing & family gatherings. This home is situated half a block from Golden Gate Park, across from a playground -basketball & tennis courts! 1.5 blocks; cafs, restaurants, shops, boutiques along the Balboa corridor!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Down-to-the-studs remodeled single-family home located in the Outer Richmond district seamlessly blends contemporary style with classic charm. This beautiful two-level residence boasts 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms and a separate office/study with 2795 sq.' of generous living space. The property features a 1-car garage with 2 off street parking spots. The upper level hosts 3 bedrooms (1 is a primary en-suite) with 2 full baths, kitchen and living room/dining room. Enjoy the cozy ambiance of the fireplace with natural light flooding the home through motorized skylights.The kitchen features high-end Thermador appliances, quartz countertops, and a spacious island.The expansive entry level offers versatile living spaces, including one of two primary suites which can be utilized as a bedroom or a game/family/media room with direct access through Anderson French doors to the private outdoor patio and newly laid synthetic grass. A separate laundry room, an office and interior access from the garage round out this fully functional level. The house is EV car ready with a 240v plug, plumbed for solar, Schluter Ditra radiant heated floors in 2 baths & Container Store Elfa Decor custom closets. Close to GGP, Lincoln Park, Balboa Theatre & More

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Rare, Grand Scale Single Family Home in the prestigious Lincoln Manor enclave of Outer Richmond. Spacious floor plan on three levels, includes 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on the top level; a wonderful main level with formal living room; dining room, bright kitchen with ample cabinet space, a convenient laundry room, and a wonderful breakfast room with beautiful views and access to the private patio and manicured garden, with a path to the detached two car garage! On the lower finished level, there is a flexible office/family room, workout space, or even an art studio, with lots of storage space and a second entrance from the back garden. You'll love the-winding streets and lush grounds of this special two-block enclave with beautiful San Francisco homes!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Unobstructed ocean views, incredible sunsets and abundant natural light are just a few special features that await the new owner of this beautiful grand-scale Edwardian home. Highly desirable floor plan with 3+ Bedrooms and 1 Bathroom all on the upper level. An additional lower level 1 Bedroom and full Bath (w/permit) offer flexibility depending on your needs. 4th Bedroom? Nanny Quarters? Home Office? The gracious main level features a spacious Living Room with built-in bookshelves, Fireplace, large Formal Dining Room, Kitchen + Nook, Laundry area and Powder Room. Preserved period detail throughout the home includes original gum wood trim, picture railing, high ceilings and polished hardwood floors. Deep lot with mature garden that is easily accessible from stairs located directly from the kitchen. Enjoy the outdoor space as is or get inspired to create your own perfect outdoor oasis. Recent improvements include a brand new roof, freshly painted interior & exterior, new carpet, professional landscaping & updated light fixtures. This popular San Fancisco neighborhood is an outdoor enthusiasts dream just blocks to GG Park, Ocean Beach, Land's End walking trails & nearby restaurants/cafes. Easy Peninsula commute via Great Hwy & 280. Welcome Home!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This stunning top-floor home showcases an array of captivating modern features that will leave you impressed. Step inside to be greeted by recessed lighting, upgraded LED fixtures, and new remote-controlled Hunter Douglas blinds on every window. Easily manage the lights, water circulation pump, thermostat, water heater, and ADT security through the Samsung SmartThings system and other convenient apps. The remodeled kitchen is a chef's dream, complete with sleek quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and 2 refrigerators. The expansive living and dining rooms fill the front of the unit with natural light pouring in through new double pane windows. The hardwood floors, fireplace, and large skylights exude elegance and create a warm and inviting ambiance. The large bedrooms include a primary suite with dual vanity, 2 closets, and a deck offering peekaboo views of Ocean Beach, Golden Gate Park, and the shared yard. Abundant storage is available with hall closets and deeded storage located in the garage near the side-by-side parking. Additional updates to the unit include a new washer, water heater, and furnace. Conveniently located near Lands End, Golden Gate and Lincoln Parks,
